reviewText: I love this video!  Nekea Brown is fun to watch, and her instructions are all clear and easy to follow.  Compared to other easy or beginner-level aerobic workout DVDs, this one rates very high.  In particular, Mirabai Holland's DVDs have good exercises but her presentation is rather bland.  Kari Anderson's Step Workout for Beginners has good moves but gets boring after a couple of viewings.  Nekea Brown keeps the workout lively and interesting.  The dance moves are easy and feel good to do. And it's a great moderate-level cardio workout! I recommend this highly for anyone, particularly women over fifty, who want to increase their cardio health without beating their feet and knees into the ground.
Title: Absolute Beginners Fitness: Step and Dance Aerobics Workout for Weight Loss & Toning - for Beginners and Active Seniors

reviewText: gets you moving enough to sweat,  easy to do and not so intimidating that we can't keep on with it.  I need to get my eyes fixed though because I thought her first name was naked  not nekea.  oh well
Title: Absolute Beginners Fitness: Step and Dance Aerobics Workout for Weight Loss & Toning - for Beginners and Active Seniors

reviewText: OK i am totally a beginner in step aerobics so thought this was the right DVD for me to start.  It was.  Very thoughtful and well done.  Explained everything, nice tutorial and was not overboard at all.  Great for beginners.
Title: Absolute Beginners Fitness: Step and Dance Aerobics Workout for Weight Loss & Toning - for Beginners and Active Seniors

reviewText: I really enjoyed this Aerobics DVD which resulted in a great workout. Everyone should try Aerobics because it is so much fun!
summary: Absolute Beginners Fitness: Step and Dance Aerobics Workout for Weight Loss.

reviewText: This is a good starter for someone who wants to get into step and dance. My best friend and I used to work out in high school so we wanted to get back in the swing of things. This was a great starter and recommended.

reviewText: It's a good workout for beginners, but it would have been nice to inform mr that I had to buy a "step stool" separately or if one came with it! I didn't buy one initially because I wasn't exactly sure if I needed one or not, but I guess that was make "newness" to step & dance aerobics!

reviewText: The exercise was good. I was able to follow the steps. I still use it once in a while. I also bought a yoga DVD so I use both.
